reviews.text: Rhoda from Ticket Office was extremely rude to me. She is a liar.  First of all she claimed that she sold me a wrong ticket because she couldn't sell tickets other than for the journeys starting from Upminster. When asked to refund or call someone senior she refused and started saying that it was my own fault. I can't believe people like this are allowed to work with customers.

Be careful when buying tickets from cashier called Rhoda. She is completely incompetent and overcharges you. When asked to refund was extremely rude and lying to cover her error. Never received a refund and was denied to speak to a manager.

Upminster station is managed by C2C train services but commuters can equally get District line trains. Accessible platforms except platform 6. Good electronic display board for train schedules.It is located in the busy area of Upminster with a near by pay car park around the station for commuters that commute into London. Always staff member to assist passengers with either top up or questions regarding right platform to board train.

Busy station with good adjacent parking. Main route to London for c2c and London underground (District and Hammersmith & City lines) and the beginning of the Oyster card zone system
Full disabled access including a lift to the main concourse from each of the platforms. Staff very helpful when assisting disabled passengers and providing disabled services (ie, assistance to board trains etc)
Well done c2c
The person not letting me to top up for no reason should sack the person stupid people
